explains: n. 混乱；杂乱的一堆东西
wordGroup: jumble sale 旧货店拍卖；慈善义卖

sentences.en: The essay was a meaningless jumble of ideas.
sentences.cn: 这篇散文思想混乱，使人不知所云。

sentences.en: She assigns ants to help her sort through a huge jumble of seeds.
sentences.cn: 她让蚂蚁们帮助她去整理混杂在一起的一大堆种子。

sentences.en: He resolves to put some kind of order into this jumble of beliefs so that justification of one proposition may follow from another.
sentences.cn: 他希望可以理顺这些混杂的信念，以便可以做到证实一个，便能随之推导出另外一个。
